interactivity.requirements: 5 Haruka Affection 5 Haruka Lust You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Invisible Worm " from Haruka Hamasaki
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Have 5+ Haruka Lust and visit her at the Koi Cafe .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Choose "Be a gentleman" in Invisible Worm . Replaced by Hurt Me .

trivia: to call him during any future intimate scenes, choosing the name Husband reveals a secret "Happy Scene" not listed as its own event, in which
eventually appears asking why the MC why he continues down this path of destruction.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.
